class LaunchApp.ParaATM[source]¶

Class ParaATM wraps the entire application together with all the layout and features tied together with the functionality.

class groundSSD.Command(cursor, map_object, args=[])[source]¶

Class Command wraps the command methods and functions to be executed. For user-defined commands, this name should be kept the same (Command).

area(vset)[source]¶

This function calculates the area of the set of FRV or ARV

conflict(traffic, ac_info)[source]¶

constructs SSDs for the current timeframe, populates FRV and ARV, and calculates FPF for aircraft in conflict :param traffic = pandas dataframe at the current time: :param ac_info = the output of load_bada command:

Returns:FPF = pandas dataframe of aircraft in the current timeframe and each respective FPF measure
load_BADA(statuses)[source]¶

returns dynamic sep dist and velocity constraints based on phase of flight

Parameters:= a list of phases of flight (statuses) –
Returns:knots,’vmax’:knots,’sep’:meters}
Return type:list of dicts of form {‘vmin’
qdrdist_matrix(lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2)[source]¶

Calculate bearing and distance vectors, using WGS‘84 In: latd1,lond1 en latd2, lond2 [deg] :positions 1 & 2 (vectors) Out: qdr [deg] = heading from 1 to 2 (matrix) d [nm]= distance from 1 to 2 in nm (matrix)

qdrdist_matrix_indices(n)[source]¶

generate pairwise combinations between n objects

rwgs84_matrix(latd)[source]¶

Calculate the earths radius with WGS‘84 geoid definition In: lat [deg] (latitude) Out: R [m] (earth radius)
